screen_desc: The screenshot shows a Google search interface. It displays a message indicating that "Web & App Activity" is turned off. To enable personalized suggestions like home and work locations and past searches, the user is prompted to turn on Web & App Activity by clicking the "Get started" button. Two location settings options, "Home" and "Work," are visible but not configured.

Since the user wants to search for Italian restaurants, the next step is to type the search query into the search bar. There is no indication that the user has begun entering their query yet, so I will proceed with typing 'Italian restaurants'.
